title: 2014-15 patch (v0.6) for FIFA 11
description:
2014-15 patch (v0.6) for FIFA 11


included:

- Selector
* db: remember last value
* fix: Last value - arena GK, arena Ball
* fix: Arena Goalkeeper - Game crash (valdes, Oliver Kahn) due of not avaible ingame
* fix: error when overwriting "read-only" files
* New: Support > Performance Improvement (lua) --> "On" after install
* New: Support > Crowd --> "Normal Crowd" after install
* can be changed while game running: 
winter - "Use Winter balls"
winter - "Players wear Winter Accessories"
players > Players - sleeves, tucked, undershorts, tight kit, Socks, Winter, Shoes
Players > Global Settings - Tight kits
Tournaments > Tournament Graphics

- squads
* fix: career (russian team)
* added to Tournaments: Champions League, Europa League (at country England)

- faces/body
* Fernando Llorente (update)
* improvements: hairlod (hair from long distance) models
* improvements: skin tones

- kitnumbers
* fix: CL numbers (wrong black numbers)

- New shoes (+ player assignments)
* adidas 11Pro - Core Black/White/Flash Orange
* adidas 11Pro - White/Black/FlashOrange
* adidas F50 adiZero  TRX - Core White/Rich Blue/Solar Green  
* adidas F50 adiZero  TRX - James Rodriguez limited edition  
* adidas F50 adiZero  TRX - Limited Edition Messi Birthday Boots  
* adidas F50 adiZero  TRX - Limited Edition Messi signature 1  
* adidas F50 adiZero  TRX - Limited Edition Messi signature 2  
* adidas F50 adiZero  TRX - Solar Green Solar Blue  
* adidas F50 adiZero  TRX - White Metallic Gold  
* adidas F50 adiZero  TRX Crazylight - Neon Orange/Black/Neon Green

* adidas F50 adiZero  XTRX Leather - Blackout
* adidas F50 adiZero  XTRX Leather - White/Solar Slime
* adidas F50 adiZero  XTRX Leather - Whiteout
* adidas F50 adiZero  XTRX Messi 2014 costumised signature - White/Black/Zest/Berry/Blue
* adidas F50 adiZero XTRX - Zest/Black/Purple/Blu/Bianco/Zest  
* adidas Nitrocharge 1.00 - Core Black/White/Flash Orange
* adidas Nitrocharge Carzylight     
* adidas Predator Instinct - Core Black/White/Solar Red
* adidas Predator Instinct - Rich Blue/White/Solar Green  
* adidas Predator Instinct - Running White/Running White/Neon Green  
* Lotto Solista II - Mundial

* Nike Magista Opus - Volt/Gold/Black/Hyper Punch
* Nike Magista Opus - White/Poison Green/Black/Total Orange
* Nike Mercurial Superfly - White/Volt/Black/Hyper Pink
* Nike Mercurial Vapor X  - Hyper Punch/Gold/Black  
* Nike Mercurial Vapor X  - Laser Orange/White/Black  
* Nike Mercurial Vapor X  - White/Volt/Hyper Pink/Black
* Nike Tiempo - White/Volt/Solar/Black
* Penalty S11 Pro - Black/Blue
* Penalty S11 Pro - Black/Yellow
* Penalty S11 Pro - Blackout
* Penalty S11 Pro - Purple
* Penalty S11 Pro - White
* Puma evoPOWER - Black Grenadine White    
* Puma evoPOWER - Camo    
* Puma evoPOWER - Celebration Pack    
* Puma evoPOWER - Graphic Dubarry Dandelion Black    
* Puma evoPOWER - High Risk Red White Fluo Blue Yellow    
* Puma evoPOWER - Ombre Blue White Fluro Peach    
* Puma evoPOWER - Pool Green White Grenadine Turbulence    
* Puma evoPOWER - Stampa
* Puma evoPOWER 1 Tricks MB Red White Green
* Puma evoSPEED 1.03 - Black/White/Turbulence/Pool Green  
* Puma evoSPEED 1.03  Special Edition - White/Red/Yellow/Blue/Silver
* Umbro GEO FLARE - Black/Orange/White
* Umbro GEO FLARE - White/Blue/Red
* Warrior Super Heat - Blue/Blue/Yellow
* Warrior Super Heat - Red/Chilli Pepper/Yellow

- kits
* T-Ekstraklasa: full
* updates: San Lorenzo, Olimpo, Quilmes
* Updates (SkyBet Badges): English leagues (Championship, League 1, League 2)
* Updated Celtic Kits with Sponsors
* 3th kit added: AtlÃƒÂ©tico Madrid, Sunderland 

- flags

- mini-faces
* new transfered players, ...

- Team logos
* update: AC Perugia

- intro
* Neuer added

- game stability/performance/functions (.lua files)
* fix: crash at arena (loading game), due of limits of statements
* overall improvements

- Ingame language
* Dutch: position name 'left/right back' (LV/RV) renamed to (LB/RB )



Supported languages english, Czech, dutch, french, german, italian, spanish (2X), portuguese, polish, Russian


Installation:
1. install fifa 11 
2. install ea patch (1.01)

3. install 2014-15 patch (v0.5)
4. install 2014-15 patch (v0.6)


Notes
- Selector dont start up (if u have .net 2.0) : copy included "Selector (.NET 2.0 version)" folder content to FIFA 11 folder


Problems:
- crashes, ...: use the "i68 regenerator" (select "take care of edited files..." > go , can take some time) 



pls leave your comments if there are any problems
